verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'sādhya-vastura avadhi' ei haya
tomāra prasāde ihā jāniluṅ niścaya

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu confirmed; sādhya-vastura—of the object of life; avadhi'-the limit; ei—this; haya—is; tomāra—of you; prasāde—by the mercy; ihā—this; jāniluṅ—I have understood; niścaya—conclusively.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu confirmed these verses recited by Śrī Rāmānanda Rāya, saying, "This is the limit of the goal of human life. Only by your mercy have I come to understand it conclusively.
